submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        i,j = 0,n-1
        dc = collections.defaultdict(int) # exact count
        dc1 = collections.defaultdict(int)
        tot = n//2
        
        while i < j:
            x,y = nums[i],nums[j]
            if x > y:
                x,y = y,x
            dc[y-x] += 1
            dc1[max(y, k-x)] += 1
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        
        rsum = 0 # running sum
        ans = float('inf')
        for i in range(k+1):
            ans = min(ans, tot + rsum - dc[i])
            rsum += dc1[i]
        return ans
